name: Your Comics
description:
One of the key dilemmas of interactive storytelling is about agency: what part of the plot is determined by the story author, and what - by the story users/participants. In this prototype a potential resolution is proposed: the user chooses who advances the story, but they still express the personalities intended by the original author.

Made in or around 2006 using HTML ImageMaps using Bryan O'Malley's artwork.
